hero-section.title: Learn Chinese
hero-section.subtitle: SkillShift — knowledge for life and career.

open-your-potential.title: Unlock your potential with the SkillShift online school!
open-your-potential.subtitle: Study at your convenience from anywhere in the world! A flexible schedule, practical skills, and mentor support will help you reach your goals quickly.

required.name: Compulsory Courses
required.desc-1: As part of preparation for the UNT, students study three key disciplines: mathematical literacy, reading literacy, and the history of Kazakhstan. Our courses help systematically master the material, develop logical and critical thinking, learn to analyze texts, and confidently navigate historical topics. All of this builds a solid foundation for successfully passing the UNT and entering university.

mathematic-informatic.name: Mathematics - Informatics
mathematic-informatic.desc-1: Designed for applicants planning to enter technical and IT specialties. The course includes advanced mathematics, basics of programming, working with algorithms, and logical thinking. Classes help systematically master key topics and confidently solve UNT tasks.

mathematic-physics.name: Mathematics - Physics
mathematic-physics.desc-1: Designed for applicants choosing engineering, technical, and natural science fields. The course includes advanced mathematics, solving physics problems, working with formulas, graphs, and laws. Classes help systematically master the material and confidently handle UNT tasks.

biology-chemistry.name: Biology - Chemistry
biology-chemistry.desc-1: Designed for applicants choosing medical, biological, or natural science fields. The course includes in-depth biology and chemistry, laboratory practices, and solving theoretical and practical problems. Classes help systematically master the material and successfully complete UNT assignments.

ielts.name: IELTS
ielts.desc-1: The IELTS preparation program provides effective methods and a deep understanding of the exam structure, which helps successfully pass the test and achieve desired results. We offer a comprehensive preparation system that includes practical tasks, test simulations, and individual consultations, significantly increasing your chances of obtaining your target score.

toefl.name: TOEFL
toefl.desc-1: The TOEFL preparation program offers effective techniques and a deep understanding of the exam structure, which helps successfully pass the test and achieve desired results. We provide a comprehensive training system that includes practice tasks, test simulations, and individual consultations, significantly increasing your chances of reaching your target score.

sat.name: SAT
sat.desc-1: The SAT preparation program provides effective strategies and a deep understanding of the exam structure, which helps students successfully complete the test and achieve desired results. We offer a comprehensive preparation system, including practice tasks, test simulations, and individual consultations, which significantly boost your chances of reaching your target score.

gre.name: GRE
gre.desc-1: The GRE preparation program helps applicants develop analytical writing, critical thinking, and mathematical problem-solving skills necessary for successful admission to graduate school. The program includes learning test-taking strategies, working with academic vocabulary, and analyzing complex texts. Special attention is given to essay writing and test practice.

gmat.name: GMAT
gmat.desc-1: The GMAT preparation program helps applicants develop analytical writing, critical thinking, and quantitative problem-solving skills required for admission to graduate school. The program covers test-taking strategies, academic vocabulary, and analysis of complex texts. Special attention is given to essay writing and practice tests.

ielts-gre.name: IELTS - GRE
ielts-gre.desc-1: This program covers preparation for IELTS to confirm English proficiency and GRE to assess analytical and quantitative skills. Training includes exam task analysis, academic writing development, test strategies, and skills in structured argumentation. Special focus is placed on preparation for the quantitative and verbal sections of GRE.

ielts-gmat.name: IELTS - GMAT
ielts-gmat.desc-1: This program covers preparation for IELTS to confirm English proficiency and GMAT to assess analytical and quantitative skills. Training includes exam task analysis, academic writing development, test strategies, and skills in structured argumentation. Special focus is placed on preparation for the quantitative and verbal sections of GMAT.

ielts-sat.name: IELTS - SAT
ielts-sat.desc-1: The combined IELTS and SAT preparation program helps applicants successfully pass the exams required for admission to foreign universities. Training includes learning strategies for tasks, information analysis, and decision-making skills. Regular mock tests and personalized recommendations improve results, while a comprehensive approach makes learning effective.

toefl-gre.name: TOEFL - GRE
toefl-gre.desc-1: This program covers preparation for TOEFL to confirm English proficiency and GRE to assess analytical and quantitative skills. Training includes exam task analysis, academic writing development, test strategies, and skills in structured argumentation. Special focus is placed on preparation for the quantitative and verbal sections of GRE.

toefl-gmat.name: TOEFL - GMAT
toefl-gmat.desc-1: This program covers preparation for TOEFL to confirm English proficiency and GMAT to assess analytical and quantitative skills. Training includes exam task analysis, academic writing development, test strategies, and skills in structured argumentation. Special focus is placed on preparation for the quantitative and verbal sections of GMAT.

toefl-sat.name: TOEFL - SAT
toefl-sat.desc-1: The combined TOEFL and SAT preparation program helps applicants successfully pass the exams required for admission to international universities. Training includes task strategies, information analysis, and structured decision-making. Regular mock exams and personalized feedback improve results, while a comprehensive approach makes learning efficient.

piano.name: Piano
piano.desc-1: You will master classical pieces, modern hits, or even learn to improvise. We focus not only on technique but also help develop musical ear and teach the fundamentals of music.
piano.desc-2: Join our classes and immerse yourself in the world of music with joy!

classic-guitar.name: Classical Guitar
classic-guitar.desc-1: In the lessons, you will learn the basics of playing, performance techniques, and music theory. You will learn to play your favorite pieces or explore classical works. We will help you develop diverse skills and musical taste.
classic-guitar.desc-2: Join our classes and discover the world of music on the classical guitar!

violin.name: Violin
violin.desc-1: In the lessons, you will master the basics of playing technique, music theory, and various performance styles. You will study classical pieces, practice ensemble playing, which will teach you to interact with other musicians.
violin.desc-2: Join our classes and discover the magic of playing the violin!

drums.name: Drums
drums.desc-1: You will learn basic rhythms and playing techniques. Classes are conducted by qualified instructors who will help you develop a sense of rhythm, coordination, and musical literacy.
drums.desc-2: Join us and start your journey into the world of percussion music!

domra.name: Domra
domra.desc-1: You will learn basic playing techniques, chords, and melodies, as well as master various performance styles. Experienced instructors will help you develop musical ear, technique, and a sense of rhythm.
domra.desc-2: Join us and discover the world of domra music!

choreography.name: Choreography
choreography.desc-1: You will master classical elements, strengthen your feet and back, and prepare the foundation for other dance styles. Experienced instructors will help you develop flexibility, coordination, and a sense of rhythm.
choreography.desc-2: Join us and unlock your dance potential!

hip-hop.name: Hip-Hop
hip-hop.desc-1: You will master the main styles of hip-hop, such as breaking, locking, and popping, and learn to create your own choreographic combinations.
hip-hop.desc-2: Join us and unleash your creativity in hip-hop dance!

tango.name: Tango
tango.desc-1: You will master the basic steps and techniques, learn to feel the music and interact with your partner. Experienced instructors will help you develop coordination and emotional expressiveness.
tango.desc-2: Join us and discover the magic of tango!

break-dance.name: Breakdance
break-dance.desc-1: You will master the basic elements of breakdance, including top-rock, down-rock, freezes, and pauses, and learn to create your own combinations. Experienced instructors will help you develop strength, flexibility, and coordination.
break-dance.desc-2: Join us and become part of the exciting world of breakdance!

shaffle.name: Shuffle
shaffle.desc-1: You will master the basic steps and techniques of shuffle and learn to combine them with various musical styles. Experienced instructors will help you develop a sense of rhythm and coordination.
shaffle.desc-2: Join us and discover the fascinating world of shuffle dance!

pop-vocals.name: Pop Vocals
pop-vocals.desc-1: You will master basic breathing, intonation, and articulation techniques, as well as learn to work with various musical styles. Experienced instructors will help you develop vocal abilities and musical ear.
pop-vocals.desc-2: Join us and start your journey to musical excellence!

classical-vocals.name: Classical Vocals
classical-vocals.desc-1: You will master basic breathing, intonation, and articulation techniques. Experienced instructors will help you develop vocal abilities and musical ear.
classical-vocals.desc-2: Join us and start your journey to musical excellence!

product-manager.name: Product Manager
product-manager.desc-1: The course combines theory and practice of digital product management at all stages of its development. You will master market, competitor, and target audience analysis using digital tools, as well as learn to manage the product lifecycle and coordinate the team effectively.

java-back-end-developer.name: Java Back-End Developer
java-back-end-developer.desc-1: The course explores the Java programming language for creating the server side of websites and applications. You will master industry-standard frameworks and libraries, understand classes, inheritance, and interfaces, and study object-oriented programming, working with collections, exception handling, and multithreading.

react-front-end-developer.name: React Front-End Developer
react-front-end-developer.desc-1: The course provides theoretical knowledge, practical skills, and modern approaches in developing interactive user interfaces using the JavaScript library — React. You will study data structure algorithms and the component-based approach in development for creating large components from smaller ones.

flutter-mobile-developer.name: Flutter Mobile Developer
flutter-mobile-developer.desc-1: The course provides theoretical knowledge and practical skills in developing cross-platform mobile applications using the Flutter framework and the Draft programming language. You will learn to create applications for different operating systems and web applications using a single codebase, and master working with databases.

ui-ux-designer.name: UI/UX Designer
ui-ux-designer.desc-1: The course covers the basics of studying user experience and needs, as well as designing clear and convenient digital products. You will master all stages of the design process and the designer's role in each, study methods for researching the target audience, and tools for designing and prototyping necessary for the job.

interior-exterior-designer.name: Interior and Exterior Designer
interior-exterior-designer.desc-1: The course covers the basics of designing functional and aesthetic interiors. You will master creating conceptual sketches, drawings, and 3D visualizations in 3DsMax and Revit, and go through all stages — from developing a style concept to selecting furniture, materials, and lighting.

fashion-designer.name: Fashion Designer
fashion-designer.desc-1: The course covers the basics and principles of creating fashion design and trends in the industry. You will study the process of creating sketches of clothing models and prints, including 3D modeling, learn to select materials and accessories, and explore all stages of designing, sewing, and launching production.

furniture-designer.name: Furniture Designer
furniture-designer.desc-1: You will study the entire process of creating furniture — from the idea and 3D modeling in SketchUp to selecting materials and production technologies. Master the skills of designing stylish and practical interior items, relying on modern trends and the specifics of various materials.

biology.name: Biology
biology.desc-1: The biology course for secondary school is aimed at studying living nature, its patterns, and diversity. It covers the main sections of biology that help students understand the structure, functions, and interactions of living organisms, as well as their role in ecosystems.

chemistry.name: Chemistry
chemistry.desc-1: The chemistry course for secondary school is aimed at studying substances, their properties, structure, and transformations. It introduces students to basic chemical concepts, laws, and processes, and develops skills in conducting experiments and solving problems.

geography.name: Geography
geography.desc-1: The geography course for secondary school is aimed at forming students' understanding of the Earth's nature, population, economy, and environmental issues. It covers general geographical patterns and the characteristics of individual regions and countries.

informatics.name: Informatics
informatics.desc-1: The informatics course forms basic knowledge and skills in the field of information technology and computer work. It covers theoretical foundations and practical aspects necessary for understanding and using modern technologies.

math.name: Mathematics
math.desc-1: The mathematics course is aimed at developing logical thinking, problem-solving skills, and applying knowledge in everyday life. It covers the main sections of mathematics that form the foundation for further study of exact sciences.

painting.name: Painting
painting.desc-1: The painting course for secondary school is aimed at forming students' understanding of artistic styles, techniques, outstanding masters, and their works. It covers the basics of fine art, the development of painting in different eras, and introduces the cultural heritage of various countries and peoples.

physics.name: Physics
physics.desc-1: The physics course for secondary school is aimed at forming students' basic knowledge of physical phenomena, laws, and methods of studying them. It covers the main sections of physics that help understand the world around us and prepare for further education.

robotics.name: Robotics
robotics.desc-1: Master the creation and programming of robots: from the basics of electronics and mechanics to developing control algorithms. Learn to assemble functional models, work with microcontrollers and sensors.

arab.name: Arabic
arab.desc-1: Arabic language courses are suitable for any level — from beginners to advanced. The program covers grammar, vocabulary, and the development of reading, writing, and listening skills. You will immerse yourself in different dialects, get acquainted with Arabic culture, and learn in an interactive format.

chinese.name: Chinese
chinese.desc-1: In Chinese language courses, you will not only master basic and grammatical structures. You will gain unique knowledge about Chinese writing, including characters. You will learn to read and write in Chinese, which is an element of deep understanding of culture and history. Master the basics of pronunciation and tones, which are especially important for perception and conveying meaning.

english.name: English
english.desc-1: Courses for people who want to communicate freely. You will learn to speak with foreigners and native speakers, improve your pronunciation, understand speech by ear, and confidently maintain a conversation in English. You will master basic conversational structures, expand your vocabulary, and overcome the language barrier. The classes include practical exercises.

kazakh.name: Kazakh
kazakh.desc-1: Our online Kazakh language courses are an opportunity to learn one of the oldest and most beautiful languages in the world. The program is suitable for all levels — from beginners to advanced. The flexible learning format allows you to master the language at your convenience while immersing yourself in the culture and traditions of Kazakhstan. Special emphasis is placed on developing conversational skills.

russian.name: Russian
russian.desc-1: We offer engaging and effective learning, specially designed for those who want to start learning Russian from scratch or improve their existing knowledge. Special attention is paid to developing oral communication skills. During the course, you will learn to correctly construct sentences typical of the Russian language.

turk.name: Turkish
turk.desc-1: Courses for those who want to communicate freely in Turkish! You will learn to converse with native speakers, improve your pronunciation, easily understand speech by ear, and confidently maintain a conversation. During the course, you will learn to correctly construct sentences and idioms typical of the Turkish language. Master the basics of pronunciation and tones.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the Privacy Policy) applies to all information that the company 'SkillShift', located at the domain names skillshift.offiwebsite.com, may receive about the User while using the website.

items.1.1.1: 1.1.1. “Website Administration” – authorized employees managing the site on behalf of the Organization, who organize and (or) carry out the processing of personal data.
items.1.1.2: 1.1.2. “Personal data” – any information relating directly or indirectly to an identified or identifiable individual.
items.1.1.3: 1.1.3. “Processing of personal data” – any action or set of actions with personal data, including collection, recording, storage, updating, use, transfer, anonymization, deletion.
items.1.1.4: 1.1.4. “Confidentiality of personal data” – a mandatory requirement to prevent distribution without the consent of the data subject.
items.1.1.5: 1.1.5. “Website User” (hereinafter referred to as the User) – a person who has access to the Website via the Internet and uses the Website.
items.1.1.6: 1.1.6. “Cookies” – a small piece of data sent by a web server and stored on the user’s computer.
items.1.1.7: 1.1.7. “IP address” – a unique network address of a node in a computer network.

items.2.1: 2.1. The User’s use of the website means acceptance of this Privacy Policy.
items.2.2: 2.2. If the User does not agree with the terms of the Privacy Policy, they must stop using the website.
items.2.3: 2.3. This Privacy Policy applies to all websites at skillshift.offiwebsite.com. The Company does not control third-party websites.
items.2.4: 2.4. The Website Administration does not verify the accuracy of personal data provided by the User.

items.3.1: 3.1. The Privacy Policy establishes the obligations of the Administration to protect the confidentiality of the User’s personal data.
items.3.2: 3.2. Personal data is provided by the User during registration or order placement and includes:
items.3.3: 3.3. The Website also collects data automatically transmitted:
items.3.3.e: • address of the page with the advertising block;
items.3.3.1: 3.3.1. Disabling cookies may limit access to parts of the site.
items.3.3.2: 3.3.2. The Website collects IP address statistics to resolve technical issues and monitor payments.
items.3.4: 3.4. Other personal information is stored and not disclosed except in cases specified by this Policy.

items.4.1.1: 4.1.1. Identification of the User to complete a purchase and contract.
items.4.1.2: 4.1.2. Providing access to personalized Website resources.
items.4.1.4: 4.1.4. Determining the User’s location for security purposes.
items.4.1.5: 4.1.5. Verifying the accuracy of User’s data.
items.4.1.6: 4.1.6. Processing and receiving payments, tax confirmations.
items.4.1.9: 4.1.9. Advertising activities with the User’s consent.
items.4.1.10: 4.1.10. Providing access to partner websites and services.

items.5.1: 5.1. Processing of personal data is carried out without time limitation, by any legal means.
items.5.2: 5.2. The Administration has the right to transfer data to third parties (courier services, postal organizations, communications) solely for fulfilling the User’s order.
items.5.3: 5.3. Personal data may be transferred to state authorities of the Republic of Kazakhstan under the law.
items.5.4: 5.4. In case of loss or disclosure of personal data, the Administration informs the User.
items.5.5: 5.5. The Administration takes measures to protect data from unlawful access and other threats.
items.5.6: 5.6. The Administration and the User jointly take measures to prevent losses due to data loss.

items.6.1.1: 6.1.1. The User must provide personal data necessary to use the Website.
items.6.1.2: 6.1.2. The User must update and supplement personal data when changes occur.
items.6.2.1: 6.2.1. The Administration must use the information only for the purposes specified in this Policy.
items.6.2.2: 6.2.2. The Administration must keep the information confidential and not disclose it without the User’s consent.
items.6.2.3: 6.2.3. The Administration must take precautions to protect the data.
items.6.2.4: 6.2.4. The Administration must block personal data upon detection of inaccuracies.

items.7.1: 7.1. The Administration is responsible for User’s losses due to unlawful use of personal data, except in cases specified in the Policy.
items.7.2: 7.2. The Administration is not responsible if the information:
items.7.2.1: 7.2.1. became public before loss or disclosure;
items.7.2.2: 7.2.2. was received from a third party before it was provided to the Administration;
items.7.2.3: 7.2.3. was disclosed with the User’s consent.

items.8.1: 8.1. Before going to court, submitting a claim is mandatory.
items.8.2: 8.2. The recipient of the claim must respond within 30 calendar days.
items.8.3: 8.3. If no agreement is reached, the dispute is considered by the court of the Republic of Kazakhstan.
items.8.4: 8.4. The current legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan applies.

items.9.1: 9.1. The Administration may change the Policy without the User’s consent.
items.9.2: 9.2. The new Policy comes into force from the moment it is published on the Website.
items.9.3: 9.3. All questions regarding the Policy should be directed via the online store’s website section.
items.9.4: 9.4. The current Policy is available at https://skillshift.offiwebsite.com/privacy-policy.

items.1.1: 1.1. This User Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the Agreement) applies to the 'SkillShift' website, located at skillshift.offiwebsite.com and all related sites associated with skillshift.offiwebsite.com
items.1.2: 1.2. The 'SkillShift' website (hereinafter referred to as the Site) is owned by IP 'Myrza'
items.1.3: 1.3. This Agreement regulates the relationship between the Site Administration of 'SkillShift' (Site Administration) and the User of this Site.
items.1.4: 1.4. The Site Administration reserves the right to change, add or remove sections of this Agreement at any time without notifying the User.
items.1.5: 1.5. Continued use of the Site by the User constitutes acceptance of the Agreement and any changes made to it.
items.1.6: 1.6. The User is personally responsible for checking this Agreement for changes.

items.2.1.1: 2.1.1. 'SkillShift' — Products and Services located at skillshift.offiwebsite.com, operating via the Internet resource and associated services.
items.2.1.2: 2.1.2. SkillShift — websites containing information about Products and Services, Sellers, allowing selection, ordering, and/or purchase of Products and Services
items.2.1.3: 2.1.3. SkillShift Website Administration — authorized employees managing the Site on behalf of IP 'Myrza'
items.2.1.4: 2.1.4. SkillShift Website User (hereinafter referred to as the User) — a person who has access to the Site via the Internet and uses the Site.
items.2.1.5: 2.1.5. Content of the SkillShift Site (hereinafter referred to as Content) — protected results of intellectual activity, including video materials, educational texts, titles, prefaces, annotations, articles, illustrations, covers, graphic, text, photographic, derivative, composite and other works, user interfaces, as well as design, structure, appearance, overall style and layout of such Content included in the Site, and other intellectual property objects.

items.3.1: 3.1. The subject of this Agreement is to provide the User with access to the materials and services available on the SkillShift Site.
items.3.1.1: 3.1.1. The online store provides the User with the following types of services: access to paid electronic content with the right to purchase Products and Services on skillshift.offiwebsite.com; access to information about the Service and to purchase the Service on a paid basis; access to individual consultations on a paid basis according to the tariffs on the SkillShift Site.
items.3.1.2: 3.1.2. This Agreement applies to all existing SkillShift services and any future modifications or additional services.
items.3.2: 3.2. Access to open sections of the SkillShift site is provided free of charge.
items.3.3: 3.3. This Agreement is a public offer. By accessing the Site, the User is deemed to have joined this Agreement.
items.3.4: 3.4. The use of the Site's materials and services is governed by the laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

4.title: 4. RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS OF THE PARTIES

items.4.1: 4.1. The Site Administration has the right to change the rules of use, restrict access, and change the payment for access to paid content.
items.4.2: 4.2. The User has the right to access paid content, use services, ask questions, and use the Site within legal limits.
items.4.3: 4.3. The User undertakes to provide accurate information, respect intellectual property rights, not disrupt the Site, not distribute confidential information, and not use the Site for prohibited purposes.
items.4.4: 4.4. The User is prohibited from using automated methods to access the Site, violating its operation, obtaining unauthorized access, violating security, or using the Site for illegal purposes.

items.5.1: 5.1. The Site and its Content are owned and managed by the Site Administration.
items.5.2: 5.2. Content may not be copied, published, reproduced, transmitted, or distributed without written consent of the Site Administration.
items.5.3: 5.3. The Site Content is protected by copyright, trademark law, and other intellectual property rights.
items.5.4: 5.4. Acquisition of any Service requires creating a User account.
items.5.5: 5.5. The User is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account.
items.5.6: 5.6. The User must immediately notify the Site Administration of unauthorized use of their account.
items.5.7: 5.7. The Site Administration has the right to annul accounts inactive for more than 24 months.
items.5.8: 5.8. This Agreement applies to all additional terms regarding purchase and services.
items.5.9: 5.9. Information on the Site should not be interpreted as an amendment to this Agreement.
items.5.10: 5.10. The Site Administration may change the list of services and prices without notice.

items.6.1: 6.1. Any losses due to violation of the Agreement or unauthorized access are not compensated by the Site Administration.
items.6.2: 6.2. The Site Administration is not responsible for delays caused by force majeure, banking systems, or lack of technical means to use the Site.

items.7.1: 7.1. The Site Administration may disclose User information if necessary for investigation or complaints.
items.7.2: 7.2. The Site Administration may disclose information to comply with laws or protect rights.
items.7.3: 7.3. Disclosure may be carried out if required by the legislation of Kazakhstan.
items.7.4: 7.4. The Site Administration may block or terminate access in case of violations or technical issues.
items.7.5: 7.5. The Site Administration is not responsible for termination of access due to User violations.

items.8.1: 8.1. Before going to court, a claim for voluntary dispute resolution must be submitted.
items.8.2: 8.2. The recipient must respond within 30 days.
items.8.3: 8.3. If voluntary resolution is impossible, either party may go to court.
items.8.4: 8.4. Claims must be filed within 10 business days, except for copyright protection.

items.9.1: 9.1. The Site Administration does not accept counter-offers from Users.
items.9.2: 9.2. User reviews are not confidential and may be used by the Site Administration.

10.title: 10. DETAILS AND ADDRESS OF THE PROVIDER

404.title: Page not found
404.description: Unfortunately, the page was not found, but you can go to the home page
